project_abstract.cdata: The Xiaolangdi Resettlement Project will restore and improve the livelihoods of 154,000 resettlers and 300,000 host people affected by construction and operation of the Xiaolangdi dam, and to minimize the adverse effects of their social adjustment to their new environment. The project comprises four major components: (a) housing and infrastructure development; (b) transfer of resettlers; (c) livelihood development for agricultural livelihood reestablishment; and (d) a planning, design, monitoring and resettlement management training component.

P003644.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>小浪底移民项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将恢复并改善受小浪底枢纽建设和运行影响的15.4万移民和30万接待区居民的生计，最大限度降低移民和居民在适应新环境过程中产生的不利影响。本项目设有四个子项目：（1）住房和基础设施建设子项目；（2）移民转移子项目；（3）农业生计重建发展子项目；（4）规划、设计、监测和移民管理培训子项目。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
